dsOverview.title: ICOADS Auxiliary and Future Datasets

summary.p: Auxiliary, preliminary, and other datasets that are to be included in ICOADS at a future time. Various format are used. We do not recommend general public use of these data. This is primarily a data exchange archive point for ICOADS researchers.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/ESRL > Earth System Research Laboratory, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
